attributes.action: To stop the proposed Female Offender centre development in Bridgend & Porthcawl
attributes.additional_details: We understand the need for one of these facilities in Wales but we believe that Bridgend is unsuitable. Due to the fact that we already have a number of similar facilities and to add another would be to the detriment of both residents and the offenders.
attributes.background: To stop the proposed Ministry of Justice plans to house women offenders in a newly-designed offenders residential unit. Both on Porthcawl waterfront at the Atlantic Hotel, or at Sunnyside House in Bridgend Town.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition Bridgend County Borough Council has stated that a representative of the Ministry for Justice has confirmed they will not be submitting planning applications for a new Wales Residential Women’s Centre at Sunnyside House in Bridgend town centre or the Atlantic Hotel in Porthcawl.

You can read the Council's full statement here: https://www.bridgend.gov.uk/news/update-on-proposed-centre-for-women-offenders/
